mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.preset_id, p.posted_at, p.like_cnt, i.img_url FROM post_tb p JOIN preset_tb pr ON p.preset_id = pr.preset_id JOIN item_tb i ON pr.product_id = i.item_id ORDER BY p.posted_at DESC
select count(*) from like_tb where user_id = #{userId} and post_id = #{postId}
mapper.delete: delete from like_tb where user_id = #{userId} and post_id = #{postId}
mapper.update: update post_tb set like_cnt = like_cnt - 1 where post_id = #{postId}
